SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent

Class EventGeolocationTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.EventGeolocationTest
public class EventGeolocationTest extends Object
Unit tests for Event geolocation functionality.

Tests validate that the geolocationRequired field is properly stored, retrieved, and persisted to Firebase.
